name: Farkas et ux., Appellants, v. Gearhart

judges: Before Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Mr. Chief Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Farkas et ux., Appellants, v. Gearhart.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs to be borne by appellants.
Mr. Chief Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Stanley M. Stein, with him Arthur L. Bloom, and Feldstein, Bloom & Grmberg, for appellants.
casebody.head_matter:
Farkas et ux., Appellants, v. Gearhart.
Argued October 9, 1974.
Before Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Stanley M. Stein, with him Arthur L. Bloom, and Feldstein, Bloom & Grmberg, for appellants.
Joseph W. Serene, for appellees.
November 20, 1974:
